Disclaimer

Website Disclaimer

Important information about the use of this website and the materials provided by Burj Clean Energy Modaraba.

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba

Website Use and Information Accuracy

Your use of this website or any associated site is at your sole risk. Burj Clean Energy Modaraba and its content providers disclaim any and all warranties. Information on this website is provided on an "as is", "as available" basis and to the fullest extent permitted by law, we do not give or make any warranty or representation of any kind, whether express or implied, in respect of such information.

We do not warrant the accuracy, adequacy, completeness, or timeliness of the information, material, products, services, or the error-free use of this website. We do not represent or warrant that the website will be available or that it will meet your requirements, that access will be uninterrupted, that there will be no delays, failures, errors, omissions, or loss of transmitted information, that no viruses or other contaminating or destructive properties will be transmitted, or that no damage will occur to your computer system.

Investment and Financial Information

All information relating to renewable energy projects, financial performance, returns, and investment opportunities presented on this website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute an offer, solicitation, or recommendation to invest in Burj Clean Energy Modaraba or any of its projects.

Past performance information, project returns, and financial data presented on this website are historical in nature and are not indicative of future results. The value of investments in the Modaraba and the income derived from them may fluctuate and investors may not recover the full amount invested.

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba does not provide investment, financial, tax, or legal advice through this website. Prospective investors should consult their own professional advisors before making any investment decisions.

Shariah Compliance

While Burj Clean Energy Modaraba operates as a Shariah-compliant entity and seeks to conduct all operations in accordance with Islamic principles, information about Shariah compliance on this website is provided for general information only. The Modaraba's Shariah Advisor's opinions and certifications are the authoritative sources for Shariah compliance matters.

Data Privacy and Personal Information

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba may use personally identifiable information collected through this website to contact users regarding products, services, and investment opportunities offered by the Modaraba, and to enhance users' experience. Information collected may also be used for research regarding the website's effectiveness and the marketing and communication efforts of Burj Clean Energy Modaraba.

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba is committed to protecting investors' and stakeholders' privacy and trust. Any information you disclose will not be sold to any third party. It may, however, be used to inform you about upcoming investment opportunities, project developments, and Modaraba offerings from time to time.

We may disclose information collected from users to trusted service providers, legal advisors, auditors, and regulatory authorities as required by law or in the normal course of business operations. We may also disclose aggregate, anonymous data for research and analysis purposes.

Information about users maintained on our systems is protected using industry-standard security measures.

Data Security Limitations

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba cannot be held responsible for any information lost during online entries or submissions, or due to unforeseen external factors such as power breakdowns, system failures, network interruptions, or cyber incidents.

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba does not guarantee that any email from this website will be sent to you or received by us, nor does Burj Clean Energy Modaraba warrant the privacy and/or security of emails during Internet transmission.

Third-Party Links and External Content

Where Burj Clean Energy Modaraba provides hypertext links to third-party websites, including partner organizations, suppliers, contractors, regulatory bodies, or news sources, such links are not an endorsement by Burj Clean Energy Modaraba of any products, services, or information provided on or via such websites. The use of such links is entirely at your own risk and Burj Clean Energy Modaraba accepts no responsibility or liability for the content, use, or availability of such websites.

Project Information and Technical Data

Information regarding renewable energy projects, installed capacity, energy generation data, environmental impact assessments, and technical specifications provided on this website is based on the best available information at the time of publication. Actual project performance may vary due to factors including but not limited to weather conditions, equipment performance, grid availability, regulatory changes, and force majeure events.

Regulatory Compliance

This website and the information contained herein are subject to the applicable laws and regulations of Pakistan, including but not limited to the Companies Act, 2017, the Securities and Exchange Commission of Pakistan (SECP) regulations, and the Modaraba Companies and Modaraba (Floatation and Control) Ordinance, 1980.

Information provided on this website should not be construed as compliance with securities laws of any jurisdiction outside Pakistan. Burj Clean Energy Modaraba certificates may not be offered or sold in any jurisdiction except in compliance with applicable laws.

Limitation of Liability

The contents of this website are distributed without any warranty of any kind. In no event shall Burj Clean Energy Modaraba be liable for any damages, losses, or liabilities including without limitation, direct or indirect, special, incidental, consequential damages, losses, or liabilities, in connection with:

  • Your use of this website or your reliance on or use of, or inability to use, the information, materials, products, and services on this website
  • Any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, defect, delay in operation or transmission, computer virus, or line or system failure
  • Any imperfection, fault, mistake, or inaccuracy with this website, its contents, or associated services
  • Any unavailability of the website or any part thereof or any contents or associated services

This limitation applies even if Burj Clean Energy Modaraba has been advised of the possibility of such damages, losses, or liabilities.

No Liability for Project Outcomes

While Burj Clean Energy Modaraba undertakes due diligence in project selection, development, and management, we cannot guarantee specific returns, energy production levels, or project success. All renewable energy projects are subject to inherent risks including technological, regulatory, environmental, and market risks.

Updates and Modifications

Burj Clean Energy Modaraba reserves the right to update, modify, or remove any information on this website at any time without prior notice. Users are advised to regularly review this disclaimer and other policies on the website.

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

This disclaimer and your use of this website shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Pakistan. Any disputes arising from the use of this website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Karachi, Pakistan.
